files.name: README.md
files.content:
# Coding Interviews in a Nutshell

"Coding Interviews In a Nutshell" is a comprehensive guide to excel in coding interviews, especially in Big Tech companies. It doesn't require prior computer science or math knowledge, making it accessible to self-taught developers (in Russian)

## TOC

### LeetCode

* [Count Vowels Permutations](posts/count-vowels-permutations.md)
* [Course Schedule II](posts/course-schedule-ii.md)
